content: make a quick fall favorite with this beginner crochet pumpkin coaster tutorial worked in half_double_crochet with a tiny stem leaf and optional curly vine learn the exact stitches simple shaping and finishing in minutes perfect as coasters an applique on blankets or strung into a cozy garland grab your hook a bit of brown yarn and let s go with a touch of double_crochet for polish materials dk weight yarn in pumpkin orange/30-40g small scraps of brown yarn stem and green leaf tools 4 0 mm g/6 crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch marker size 10 14 cm / 4 4 5-5″ across easily adjusted skill level basic/beginner
